I generally wear a 32x30. The Amazon Basics cargo pants fit like a glove, but I liked the Dark Khaki color of these. When I got them the quality looked really good, if a bit heavier than the Amz basics. Unfortunately, whomever was creating the sizing for these had no idea what 'sizing' really is. Their 32 waist is more like a 28, I couldn't even close them. Also there's no way these are 30 long, more like 33 since they covered my feet like little pant versions of a straight jacket.  Really disappointing. I considered buying a larger size, but then I'd probably be able fold the pant legs back up to my waste. My suggestion is, don't bother.

评论概述: This is for the 'Grass Max' cargo pants 34"W
评论详情: I really like these pants. They have a unique pattern and fit well for me. I'm 6' and 34s are what I generally wear. These are closer to form fitting than not, but not so much that it's uncomfortable. These are a summer weight fabric, perfect for the south where I live. They do feel and look like they will last awhile if taken care of.

My husband liked the fit and color is a nice tone of dark khaki. Material seems to be good and is comfy. Still has to be washed after wearing...but so far so good. It is not real heavy, but not thin fabric either. Delivered pretty quick. If you're in between sizes, I would say size down. My husband wears consistently size 36 and is 1.95m tall. So we purchased the size 36, and it is a bit on the "loose"/big side. Also in my opinion the length is somewhat "longer". But he liked the fit anyway, so we kept it.

I was not expecting to be too impressed with these pants. However, they exceeded my expectations. Now, granted, I have not worn them or washed them, but for the price, they appear well made, well cut and will serve the purpose I got them for: namely, a practical, comfortable cargo pant that can hold a few items.  The pockets are gusseted, allowing for storage, and the pocket buttons are well placed. They are a little long, but the ankle ties solve for that. The waist is a little tight, but I expect that will stretch as I wear them. The color, a dark gray, is exactly what I hoped it would be: an off-black, giving them a washed, vintage feel.  I am hoping they wash and wear as well as they appear.
Great all around

I love these! They are comfortable, they look great and are well made. The pockets are nice and deep. So why only 4 stars? Because every hair within 100 yards will stick to these pants. We have pets. If you order these, you'd better also order a lint brush.

评论概述: Were some of my fav pants
评论详情: These were some of my fav and most durable pants. I had these pants for several years and did so much in them like ice climbing and hiking. They handled it well but finally started to fall apart in the crotch area. As a bigger dude, I'm used to pants forming holes in the inner thigh but I am happy that these pants were able to hold on for so long
Nothing. Work.

The material is nice and thick for colder weather but these pants didn't account for flexibility at all, I can't even comfortably raise my leg and form a 90° angle, so with that being said I can't even comfortably walk, and yes I wore my pants as high as I possibly could, and it didn't matter, and yes I wear a belt as a properly domesticated person does when wearing pants.  The pockets are deep enough but aren't tall enough if that makes sense; meaning that whatever you put in your pocket is absolutely glued to your legs which is uncomfortable. This therefore demands you outright exclude your regular front pockets to feel even moderately comfortable which is insane for pants that are supposed to promote utility.  And no this isn't an isolated incident; I purchased 5 of these cargo pants for work, and 5 of these pants have provided the same experience. If these issues would be fixed I would buy 5 more for just for fashion, but instead all 5 will be returned.  This is the perspective of someone who is wearing a 38" W 32" L and this size is comfortable for me; not too loose, not too tight of course.

评论概述: Amazing quality cargo pants for men and women
评论详情: I previously bought a pair of cargos from this brand and followed my waist and hip sizing using the sizing chart they provided (32). However I was not accounting for the fact that they make men’s sizing looser in the crotch and just in general because men like a looser fit. So although they were cute loose fit I ordered  a size 30 to see what the difference would be and they fit so much better. Definitely size down if you're looking for a more fitted look.

Iam volunteer FD. I've had these pants for 4 years. Went through the fire academy in em. Low crawled, trained. They hold up. Ordered another pair today (after 4 years)  only because they're so faded I have to take em out of service .  Strong. Durable pants. Not to mention they look great and the tapered legs help me jump into my Bunker gear with ease. Would highly recommend
